SummaryEnglish: After Koyomi graduates, lonely Kanbaru hears rumors of a wish-granter "Mr. Devil." Seeking him out, she finds her ex-rival Numachi instead. Can Kanbaru help resolve Numachi's plight?

1.SummaryEnglish: The morning of April 9th. She wakes up after she had a dream about her mother Toue. When she happens to meet male junior student Ougi Oshino, he tells her that "Devil Lord" has solved a lot of problems. She follows his story, and then she meets her old baseball rival Rouka Numachi again.

2.SummaryEnglish: The morning of April 10th. Suruga gets back her human left arm when she wakes up. She feels happy, but she wonders why the hand of Rainy Devil disappeared now. April 15th, Suruga meets Kaiki outside of Naoetsu-city.

3.SummaryEnglish: April 16th. Suruga meets Rouka. She notices that Rouka deprived Suruga of the hand of Rainy Devil. It makes her angry because she believes that's a punishment for her that hurt her friends before.

4.SummaryEnglish: Rouka tells Suruga why she has been gathering some tales of other's misfortunes and the pieces of devil's body. Suruga doesn't accept her negative life. Then, Karen gives her an information about Rouka.

5.SummaryEnglish: April 20, Suruga receives a package, in which is a head of Rainy Devil from Kaiki. She reads a message from him, so she decides to confront Rouka.
